module.name: Backup & Restore
module.changelog: *2.0.3* don't have BLKVM and FM astdb trees, which shouldn't be left around anyhow *2.0.2* fixed restore ALL to get it to actually work *2.0.1* supplied defaults and fixed bug is weekdays schedule_functions.php - #1279 *2.0* Now backs up and restores astdb, which was causing problems with phone configurations. *1.2* Potential fix for restore issues, clean up some warnings
